text: Frederick Johnson was an English professional football right half who played in the Football League for Gainsborough Trinity. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |FA Cup ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Brentford |1898–99 |Southern League Second Division |11 |7 | colspan="2" |— |42 appearances and 2 goals in West Middlesex Cup, 2 appearances and 1 goal in Middlesex Senior Cup |3 |15 |10 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !11 !7 !0 !0 !4 !3 !15 !10 |} ==References== Category:English footballers Category:English Football League players Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Southern Football League players Category:1876 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Brentford F.C. players Category:Association football wing halves Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire
title: Frederick Johnson (footballer)
